data: `minecraft:behavior.work_composter` allows the NPC to use the composter POI to convert excess seeds into bone meal.

data.Name: active_time
data.Description: The amount of ticks the NPC will stay in their the work location

data.Name: block_interaction_max
data.Description: The maximum number of times the mob will interact with the composter.

data.Name: can_empty_composter
data.Description: Determines whether the mob can empty a full composter.

data.Name: can_fill_composter
data.Description: Determines whether the mob can add items to a composter given that it is not full.

data.Name: can_work_in_rain
data.Description: If true, this entity can work when their jobsite POI is being rained on.

data.Name: goal_cooldown
data.Description: The amount of ticks the goal will be on cooldown before it can be used again

data.Name: items_per_use_max
data.Description: The maximum number of items which can be added to the composter per block interaction.

data.Name: min_item_count
data.Description: Limits the amount of each compostable item the mob can use. Any amount held over this number will be composted if possible

data.Name: on_arrival
data.Description: Event to run when the mob reaches their jobsite.

data.Name: speed_multiplier
data.Description: Movement speed multiplier of the mob when using this AI Goal

data.Name: use_block_max
data.Description: The maximum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

data.Name: use_block_min
data.Description: The minimum interval in which the mob will interact with the composter.

data.Name: work_in_rain_tolerance
data.Description: If "can_work_in_rain" is false, this is the maximum number of ticks left in the goal where rain will not interrupt the goal
